name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Fullstack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing high-performance solutions utilizing **Python**, **FastAPI**, **TypeScript**, **Vue.js**, **React**, and robust database management with **SQL** and **PostgreSQL**. My technical architecture expertise enables me to create scalable applications, and I bring a strong understanding of **LLM** and **Prompt Engineering** for enhancing application performance. I possess a proven track record in mentoring junior developers, ensuring knowledge transfer and skill development within teams.

I have successfully built enterprise-grade platforms in healthcare and finance that integrate modern technologies and adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My experience encompasses end-to-end full-stack development, cloud computing with **Azure** and **AWS**, and implementing microservices architecture. I also apply CI/CD automation for efficient deployment, and my hands-on work includes developing machine learning pipelines and utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for MLOps workflows.
